casebody.data:
FINANCIAL FREEDOM ACQUISITION, LLC
v.
Ann T. GRIFFIN, Executrix (Estate of Angela C. Griffin), et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2017

Ronald P. Sherlock, in support of the petition.

The petition by the defendants Ann T. Griffin, executrix of the estate of Angela C. Griffin, and Ann T. Griffin, individually, for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn.App. 314, 170 A.3d 41 (2017), is denied.
